title: Update Student's Legal Name
description: A student has legally changed their name and needs to update their official university records.

tasks.description: Identify the student and explain the process for a legal name change.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent explains the need for official documentation (e.g., court order, marriage certificate).

tasks.description: Provide the student with a secure link to upload their legal documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a secure upload link to the student's email.

tasks.description: Once documentation is received and verified, update the student's name in the SIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: After verification, the agent updates the student's name in the primary system.
